info.title: su-manager-api
info.summary: An API for the su-manager web-app
info.description: Provides all needed resources for the su-management system.

get.summary: Get all admins in the system

put.summary: Update the profile of this admin.

delete.summary: Delete this admins profile from the system

get.summary: Get the list of authorities of this admin

post.summary: Give a list of authorities to this admin

get.summary: Get all the jyjns assigned to this admin

delete.summary: Unassign all the jyjns assign to this admin from it

post.summary: Assign a list of jyjns to this admin

put.summary: Unassign a list of jyjn assigned to this admin from it

get.summary: Get the profile information of this jyjn

delete.summary: Delete the profile of this jyjn

put.summary: Update the profile information of this jyjn

get.summary: Get the authorities assigned to this jyjn

post.summary: Assign a list of sus to this jyjn

delete.summary: Unassign all sus assign to this jyjn

get.summary: Get all the sus assign to this jyjn

put.summary: Assign or unassign a list of sus to this jyjn

delete.summary: Delete this su from the system

put.summary: Update profile information of this su

delete.summary: Delete the saint assign to this su

get.summary: Get the saint assign to this su

delete.summary: Delete this saint profile from the system

get.summary: Get all the reports of this su

post.summary: Create a report on this su

get.summary: Get the lifepaper of this su

value.plan-for-next-twelve-month: CIO of the company he works at
CIO of the company he works at

post.summary: Create a mentor on this lifepaper

get.summary: Get the mentor of this lifepaper

delete.summary: Delete the mentor of a lifepaper

put.summary: Update the mentor of a lifepaper

post.summary: Create the religion of this lifepaper

get.summary: Get the religion of this lifepaper

delete.summary: Delete the religion of this lifepaper

put.summary: Update the religion of this lifepaper

post.summary: Create a list of extensions on this lifepaper

get.summary: Get all the extensions of this lifepaper

delete.summary: Delete an extension of a lifepaper

put.summary: Update an extension of a lifepaper

get.summary: Get the confidant of this lifepaper

post.summary: Create the confident of this lifepaper

put.summary: Update the confidant of a lifepaper

delete.summary: Delete the confidant of a lifepaper

get.summary: Get all the sus this admin is assign to

post.summary: Assign and/or unassign a list of sus to this admin (using the ids of these sus)

delete.summary: Unassign all the sus assign to this admin from him
